pullrequest.title: Add support for setting visibility mask and flags

content.raw: Did you consider putting this functionality into `Node`? Just curious, because sometimes the difference in responsibility between `Visual` and `Node` are a bit fuzzy to me. I just want to make sure we don't end up in a situation similar to issue #58.
content.html: Did you consider putting this functionality into Node? Just curious, because sometimes the difference in responsibility between Visual and Node are a bit fuzzy to me. I just want to make sure we don't end up in a situation similar to issue #58.

pullrequest.title: Add support for setting visibility mask and flags

content.raw: the difference between Visual and Node is that Visual should have some visual appearance while Node is just an abstract object with pose \(and not necessary have any visual appearance\). Sensor/Camera class also derives from Node \(since it has a pose and can be moved\) so I did not put visibility flags at the Node level. Otherwise, we would have a situation where a camera has both visibility mask and flags, which can be confusing.
content.html: the difference between Visual and Node is that Visual should have some visual appearance while Node is just an abstract object with pose (and not necessary have any visual appearance). Sensor/Camera class also derives from Node (since it has a pose and can be moved) so I did not put visibility flags at the Node level. Otherwise, we would have a situation where a camera has both visibility mask and flags, which can be confusing.
